document.full_text: the indiana legislature approved bills on wednesday that would usher in sweeping changes to the state's educational system by creating a statewide private school voucher program and expanding the state's charter school program.
document.title: indiana legislature approves statewide school voucher program
lines_and_colors: the indiana legislature approved bills on wednesday that would usher in sweeping changes to the state's educational system by creating a statewide private school voucher program and expanding the state's charter school program.
